description:
Enjoy building wealth, part-time, without any experience - from anywhere in the world!

Based upon the best-selling real estate investment book "Zero Risk Real Estate", this is a comprehensive audio, video and workbook training course on how you can create long-term wealth through tax lien and tax deed real estate investing.

While tax lien investing has been around for centuries, the world has changed - thanks to technology and foreclosures! Now you can learn the latest techniques and strategies on how to invest in SECURE real estate instruments, enjoy returns of 12%, 18%, 50% or more - and have those returns guaranteed by the government!

The course includes audio instruction with downloadable text manual, step-by-step demonstration videos, and even specific letters, forms and worksheets to maximize your results - in the shortest time possible!

Learn from one of the masters of the game. Chip has written eight books, is the host of the syndicated "Financial Fitness Show", and appeared on numerous radio and television programs. More importantly, he shares case studies and examples of personal tax sale deals he and his coaching students have done!

The course starts at the very beginning, and takes you step-by-step through the process. It's easy enough for a teenager to do - with the right instruction! Complete the course in as little as a few days, and have your first investment within weeks...

If you have any interest in creating long-term wealth for you and your family, without long hours, without any experience, and without risk - then this is the course for you!
title: Zero Risk Real Estate - Creating Wealth Through Tax Sales
